text:
"Next Friday" is a 2000 American comedy movie and the sequel to the 1995 movie "Friday". It is the first movie to be produced by Ice Cube's movie production company Cubevision. It was directed by Steve Carr.
It stars Ice Cube, Mike Epps, Don "D.C." Curry, John Witherspoon, and Tommy "Tiny" Lister Jr. The movie was released on January 12, 2000.
